dict.acceptation: 他[她，它]们自己；他们亲自；“himself”的复数；“herself”的复数；

sent.orig: They can think themselves into other people's minds, imagine themselves into other people's places.
sent.trans: 他们可以将心比心、设身处地的理解他人。

sent.orig: Alternately, many people set themselves up for failure simply by talking themselves out of success.
sent.trans: 同样的，很多人就是因为没想过自己能成功，而让自己和成功绝缘。

sent.orig: We want molecules to learn how to make copies of themselves by themselves.
sent.trans: 我们要让分子学会如何独自制造自身的副本。

sent.orig: Both men and women same understanding love themselves and dressing up themselves.
sent.trans: 男人要和女人一样懂得爱惜自己，装扮自己。

sent.orig: Must they reconcile themselves to their fate,they asked themselves.
sent.trans: 他们扪心自问：难道就应甘心忍受这种命运吗？
